Oh, the pink skin mayor guy.
Nice of you to drop by.
You don't seem very happy to see me, though.
You should be happy to see me. If you need anything done around here, you gonna need some workers, unless you are prepared to work with your two hands.
And neither of you look like you are used to working on your own.
Call me Flak. I'm the head of worker guild. You pay me, I lend you workers to do whatever you need.
Pay to you, but not them? This sounds awful like slavery.
What a foul word for a young lady.
They are not slaves, they are workers. And you will need them to move things around.
You have to feed them once in a while or they will stop working.
Actually, business wasn't so great recently.
You know what? Since you just started here, I'll let you have one worker as a gift.
Make sure to make some use of them. Goblins are shitty workers, so don't be shy of using a stick discipline.
(Gulp)
Aren't you a goblin as well?
You bet. Good think I'm not a worker, heh.
